channel.title: Rage-Scape 728 - Perfect Economy - All 24 Skills - Squeal of Fortune - Unique
channel.description:
Welcome to the ultimate economy server with the newest graphics! This project has been worked on all summer and is finally being released with loads of features. Oh yes... We have a full Squeal of Fortune ;)
Website: www.Rage-Scape.com Download: www.Rage-Scape.com/RageScape.zip Download 2: www.Rage-Scape.com/webclient/client.jar Webclient: www.Rage-Scape.com/webclient/index.php
Every skill works, all 100% trainable. We even have full construction and hunter!
Minigames: Fight Caves Fight Kiln Dominion Tower (All 5 Modes) Crucible Clan Wars (Safe/Dangerous/Clan) Sorceress' Garden Pest Control Runespan (Almost Done :D - Few More Days) Stealing Creations - 70% Castle Wars Puro Puro Barrows Duel Arena
Combat: All combat skills add up to 138. All spells in all 3 magic books work. Normal prayers and ancient curses work. Majority of Specials work. Quick prayers function properly. Ranged and magic work from distances. 3 items kelt on death. Grim Reaper's office on death. All item's have bonuses. Combat differences in the wildy. Majority of item's have their working effects. Rapid switching and correct following. Working Kill/Death Ratio. Random Pvp drops. Gravestones upon death. You have been killed by xxx.
Full Dungeons/Lairs: Taverly Dungeon Brimhaven Dungeon Fremmenik Slayer Dungeon Slayer Tower Revant Cave Edgeville Dungeon Living Rock Cavern Glacors Cave Jadinko Lair Frost Dragon Lair Ancient Caverns Elite Knight Lair Ice Cave Corporeal Beast Lair Queen Black Dragon Lair King Black Dragon Lair TzHaar/Karamja Cave Lava Maze Dungeon Godwar Dungeon Kalphite Lair Skytrworm Lairs (for all 4 types) Polypore Dungeon Lumbridge Swamp Smoke Dungeon Chaos Tunnels Desert Slayer Dungeon Chaos Dwogre Battle Field
Quests: Nomad's Requiem While Guthux Sleeps
Random Events: Trivia Geni Lamp Rock Golem Sandwich Lady
Other: Squeal of Fortune Dicing with clan rolls. Pets, summoning and extra. Working emotes. 100% Friends chat with lootshare. Working loyalty auras. Sexy panel in the quest tab. Customizable skillcapes. Teleporting all over the world with complete cities. Grand Exchange. Working clans. Working money pouch. Prestiging system. Ability to change your home out of 5 locations. Loads more!
Images: [img]http://i.imgur.com/uWRwi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/JMlm6.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dp01E.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/EjsXS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NPiam.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rnbI1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/F0cLH.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XXn69.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lBVkb.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/p7Zcm.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ia5a0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/iyKpB.png[/img]
Need I put more pictures? Too many to post...

item.title: Rage-Scape 728 - Perfect Economy - All 24 Skills - Squeal of Fortune - Unique
item.dc:creator: @hottys2good4 hottys2good4
item.description:
@hottys2good4 wrote:

Welcome to the ultimate economy server with the newest graphics!
This project has been worked on all summer and is finally being released with loads of features.
Oh yes… We have a full Squeal of Fortune

Website: www.Rage-Scape.com
Download: www.Rage-Scape.com/RageScape.zip
Download 2: www.Rage-Scape.com/webclient/client.jar
Webclient: www.Rage-Scape.com/webclient/index.php

Every skill works, all 100% trainable. We even have full construction and hunter!

Minigames:
Fight Caves
Fight Kiln
Dominion Tower (All 5 Modes)
Crucible
Clan Wars (Safe/Dangerous/Clan)
Sorceress’ Garden
Pest Control
Runespan (Almost Done - Few More Days)
Stealing Creations - 70%
Castle Wars
Puro Puro
Barrows
Duel Arena

Combat:
All combat skills add up to 138.
All spells in all 3 magic books work.
Normal prayers and ancient curses work.
Majority of Specials work.
Quick prayers function properly.
Ranged and magic work from distances.
3 items kelt on death.
Grim Reaper’s office on death.
All item’s have bonuses.
Combat differences in the wildy.
Majority of item’s have their working effects.
Rapid switching and correct following.
Working Kill/Death Ratio.
Random Pvp drops.
Gravestones upon death.
You have been killed by xxx.

Full Dungeons/Lairs:
Taverly Dungeon
Brimhaven Dungeon
Fremmenik Slayer Dungeon
Slayer Tower
Revant Cave
Edgeville Dungeon
Living Rock Cavern
Glacors Cave
Jadinko Lair
Frost Dragon Lair
Ancient Caverns
Elite Knight Lair
Ice Cave
Corporeal Beast Lair
Queen Black Dragon Lair
King Black Dragon Lair
TzHaar/Karamja Cave
Lava Maze Dungeon
Godwar Dungeon
Kalphite Lair
Skytrworm Lairs (for all 4 types)
Polypore Dungeon
Lumbridge Swamp
Smoke Dungeon
Chaos Tunnels
Desert Slayer Dungeon
Chaos Dwogre Battle Field

Quests:
Nomad’s Requiem
While Guthux Sleeps

Random Events:
Trivia
Geni Lamp
Rock Golem
Sandwich Lady

Other:
Squeal of Fortune
Dicing with clan rolls.
Pets, summoning and extra.
Working emotes.
100% Friends chat with lootshare.
Working loyalty auras.
Sexy panel in the quest tab.
Customizable skillcapes.
Teleporting all over the world with complete cities.
Grand Exchange.
Working clans.
Working money pouch.
Prestiging system.
Ability to change your home out of 5 locations.
Loads more!
